name: ChinesePod Recap
description: Too busy to listen to a full ChinesePod lesson? Try out our short recap segments.   ChinesePod Recap App (currently in Beta) offers access to short review segments based on full-length ChinesePod lessons. These are aimed explicitly at solidifying previously studied material and extend long-term retention. These lessons come in 90-second, 3-minute, and 6-minute intervals (where available) and capture essential points of each lesson. Select the recap length that most suits your current time constraints and jump right in. Recap lessons focus on your personal ChinesePod study history and will offer only one lesson at a time.  Dont waste your time browsing for the next lesson. If you only have a few minutes to spare, jump right back into relevant content and ensure long-term retention.
